meanings.definition: A unit of length equal to one millionth of an inch.
meanings.sent1: I need a microscope to see something as small as a microinch.
meanings.sent2: The fabric was measured in microinches to ensure precision.
meanings.sent3: The tiny ant asked for a microinch of sugar for its tea.
meanings.sent4: Her patience was as thin as a microinch when waiting in line.
meanings.sent5: The microinch of dust on the shelf was barely visible.

meanings.definition: To measure or express in microinches.
meanings.sent1: He decided to microinch the dimensions for accuracy.
meanings.sent2: She carefully microinched the thickness of the paper before cutting.
meanings.sent3: The tailor promised to microinch the suit to fit perfectly.
meanings.sent4: His attention to detail allowed him to microinch the measurements effortlessly.
meanings.sent5: The engineer needed to microinch the parts to ensure they fit together seamlessly.
